name: part_010
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE】シャチ爆誕！初ゲストあり！【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [_rgeHcQu0Tc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs "Perfect Crime" on stage with a live band.
Stage transition with lights dimming between song performances.
Sakamata Chloe performs "擬態ごっこ" (Mimicry Play) on stage.

subtitles.original:
Perfect Crime
作詞・作曲: 百合　編曲: THE 118's
subtitles.english:
Perfect Crime
Lyrics/Composition: Yuri, Arrangement: THE 118's

subtitles.original: あたしのブラックリストです
subtitles.english: It's my blacklist

subtitles.original: 愛していたのです
subtitles.english: I was in love with you

subtitles.original: 嫌いな人なんです
subtitles.english: You're someone I hate

subtitles.original: あたしだけに優しい
subtitles.english: You're kind only to me

subtitles.original: あたしだけに優しい
subtitles.english: You're kind only to me

subtitles.original: あたしだけに優しい
subtitles.english: You're kind only to me

subtitles.original: あたしを可愛いと言ってくれる
subtitles.english: You tell me I'm cute

subtitles.original: あたしのこと一番と言ってくれる
subtitles.english: You tell me I'm your number one

subtitles.original: あたししか愛せないはず
subtitles.english: You're only supposed to love me

subtitles.original: あたしを綺麗にしてくれる
subtitles.english: You make me beautiful

subtitles.original: あたしの為に死ねる
subtitles.english: You'd die for me

subtitles.original: あたしが居ないと眠れない
subtitles.english: You can't sleep without me

subtitles.original: あたしの声を聞かないと生きられない
subtitles.english: You can't live without hearing my voice

subtitles.original: あたしにしか縋れないはず
subtitles.english: You're only supposed to cling to me

subtitles.original: あたしの為に生まれてきたなら
subtitles.english: If you were born for my sake...

subtitles.original: あたしの為に死ねよ
subtitles.english: ...then die for my sake

subtitles.original: 病める時も
subtitles.english: In sickness...

subtitles.original: 健やかなる時も
subtitles.english: ...and in health

subtitles.original: 富める時も
subtitles.english: For richer...

subtitles.original: 貧しき時も
subtitles.english: ...or for poorer

subtitles.original: 愛し敬い慈しむことを誓いますと
subtitles.english: I vow to love, honor, and cherish you...

subtitles.original: 言え
subtitles.english: Say it

subtitles.original: 愛しそして壊す
subtitles.english: Love, and then destroy

subtitles.original:
擬態ごっこ
作詞・作曲: DECO*27　編曲: Rockwell
subtitles.english:
Mimicry Play
Lyrics/Composition: DECO*27, Arrangement: Rockwell

subtitles.original: 笑ってるけどどっか無いんだ
subtitles.english: I'm laughing, but something's missing

subtitles.original: 痛みがご褒美の日な
subtitles.english: A day where pain is the reward

subtitles.original: 思ってるけどずっと溜めてんだ
subtitles.english: I'm thinking about it, but I've been bottling it up

subtitles.original: 蜜の味呪いの愛が
subtitles.english: The taste of honey, the cursed love...

subtitles.original: すり減って濁って I love myself
subtitles.english: ...worn down and muddied, I love myself

subtitles.original: 伝ってそうやって籠もって不感症
subtitles.english: Tracing it, that way, shutting myself in, frigidity

subtitles.original: 補ってキスをしてみるけど
subtitles.english: I try to make up for it with a kiss, but...

subtitles.original: 渇いた御誂え向きってなんだ
subtitles.english: ...what is this parched "just right" feeling?

subtitles.original: 擬態ごっこいいねもっと
subtitles.english: Mimicry play, it's good, give me more

subtitles.original: つまんない嘘ばかりのシンデレラ
subtitles.english: A Cinderella full of boring lies

subtitles.original: 叶えたい消えたい歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want it to come true, I want to disappear, it's all warping

subtitles.original: 境界線
subtitles.english: Boundary line

subtitles.original: どれも正解で
subtitles.english: Everything is the right answer

subtitles.original: 叶えたい消えたい歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want it to come true, I want to disappear, it's all warping

subtitles.original: 君だけには教えてもいいかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can tell only you
